In every spring and autumn time, there are a group of passionate reception volunteers in Dong Hwa campus to help international freshmen integrate into Taiwan and campus life and give them the warmest and most empathetic support.

Through exchanges with international students, Taiwan's friendliness and diverse and unique culture are not only conveyed, but also explore more possibilities of itself and choose to go to the world.

If you want to have a richer and more exciting university life and are willing to have more connections with the world, you are welcome to join our international reception volunteer program!
